proActiv 0.99.0
  • Getting Started
  • Functions and Data

Reference

Main functions

proActiv()

Wrapper function returning Summarized Experiment object giving promoter counts and activity

preparePromoterAnnotation()

Prepare promoter annotation data for the user specified txdb object

plotPromoters()

Visualize promoter activity and transcript model for a gene of interest

Helper functions

calculateJunctionReadCounts()

Calculate the total number of junction reads overlapping with the introns of each promoter for the input junction file

calculatePromoterReadCounts()

Calculate the promoter read counts using junction read counts approach for all the input junction files

normalizePromoterReadCounts()

Normalize promoter read counts using DESeq2

getAbsolutePromoterActivity()

Prepare the absolute promoter activity table including the promoter and gene ids

getGeneExpression()

Prepare the gene expression table including the gene ids

getRelativePromoterActivity()

Prepare the relative promoter activity table including the promoter and gene ids

Data

promoterAnnotation.gencode.v19

Promoter annotation data for Gencode.v19 including all the annotation objects required for promoter activity estimation

promoterAnnotation.gencode.v34

Promoter annotation data for Gencode.v34 including all the annotation objects required for promoter activity estimation

promoterAnnotation.gencode.vM1

Promoter annotation data for Gencode.vM1 including all the annotation objects required for promoter activity estimation

promoterAnnotation.gencode.vM25

Promoter annotation data for Gencode.vM25 including all the annotation objects required for promoter activity estimation
